text:
Hi! Is there in planning a possibility to pay for the Pro version of the Slack to have access to older messages?
There is a ton of knowledge in the past conversations and some threads are not finished yet but they are blurry already.

elements.text:
Hi! Is there in planning a possibility to pay for the Pro version of the Slack to have access to older messages?
There is a ton of knowledge in the past conversations and some threads are not finished yet but they are blurry already.

text: Slack Pro is very expensive - based on our current active users it would be around USD 10k/year. Currently I can get a full download of our history, but from August 26, I'll only be able to get the past year. I have made a note to get a full download later this week and add to the R Contribution Working Group GitHub. Unfortunately I don't think I can automate this as I need to request it through the admin portal. I will set a reminder to do it every 90 days. We previously discussed Matrix as an alternative and it could be time to revisit this. There may be someone at the R hackathon at RSECon24 that would like to work on setting up a test instance.

Unfortunately I don't think I can automate this as I need to request it through the admin portal. I will set a reminder to do it every 90 days. We previously discussed Matrix as an alternative and it could be time to revisit this. There may be someone at the R hackathon at RSECon24 that would like to work on setting up a test instance.
